entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Clearing overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 8 May 2023
